bow: anyone else annoyed by people constantly telling you your baby is hungry ftm at 29 and none of my friends have had children yet ve just gotten home from my first dinner out with group of friends bubs weeks and feeling super judged and annoyed feed my bub literally 10 minutes before arrived and know him well enough to know that he was definitely not hungry while we were there but after an hour he started to get tired and grizzly it was 8pm which is around his bed time literally everyone kept telling me that he must be hungry should just feed him kept saying nope he just tired but they insisted over and over again he was hungry and started feeling judged for not feeding him looking after him it was really uncomfortable one person insisted that he probably having growth spurt and needs extra milk this literally happens all the time would have just finished feeding him and someone will pop over our parents friends siblings etc to visit and the moment he pulls face or grizzles they tell me he starving and should feed him also feel like they don believe me when say he isn it really really really annoying he massively chunky baby that clearly not underfed so why do they do this am just over sensitive or is this just what people do baby cries baby hungry they do have moods or personalities they do get tired or uncomfortable they do get sensitive to lights and sounds nope babies are tiny humans they literally only eat and cry to eat more duh ugh everyone did this to me too so annoying unfortunately as mom you re going to have to develop thick skin because others are always judging you and suggesting you do things their way so my baby is almost months old he my first and going on 35 in month now realize that most of his annoyances in the newborn stage were related to him being hungry ll watch videos back and at the time could believe that he was hungry or was just plain blind to it it seems so obvious to me now not saying this is the case with your baby but as moms we start to develop this weird sick sense as to whether baby is hungry in baby group with few newborns and can definitely tell that the baby is hungry but the mom is able to see it they re all ftm if these people giving you advice have had baby within the passed years ignore them they do remember correctly and it depends lot on whether your baby is formula fed or breast milk fed breast milk digests lot faster and these babies require more frequent feedings maybe not what you wanted to hear but thought that toss my experience in there hate it congratulate you for your good instincts and your strength to follow them that is the best protection against probably well meaning comments like that now with my second baby am almost always sure what the cause for her crying is and can act accordingly no matter what other people think should do with my first was quite stressed out sometimes and comments like that were really annoying similarly irritating for me was the constant question ‚why is she crying yeah well right now obviously don know but thought good mother should know now think that it takes some time to really get to know your baby and that some babies are just harder to twin cries who is ebf he always says she is hungry or if she chews on her hands or anything she is months and teething for christ sakes our other twin gets both formula and breast milk but he never assumes she is hungr 🙄🙄🙄🙄 you are not alone this has happened to me too it is super annoying but you know baby best and what he needs do your thing and if when they have kids they ll get it feel you
